Name: sprint_effort_le_team_velocity
Description: The total effort in a sprint backlog must not exceed the team's velocity

Name: worker_must_be_active
Description: A worker assigned to a task must have an active status

Name: team_size_gt_min
Description: A scrum team must have a minimum number of members (e.g., 3)

Name: team_size_le_max
Description: A scrum team should not exceed a maximum number of members (e.g., 9)

Name: story_must_have_points
Description: Every user story selected for a sprint must have story points assigned

Name: daily_scrum_duration_le_15_min
Description: The daily scrum meeting must not exceed 15 minutes

Name: sprint_has_a_goal
Description: Every sprint must have a clearly defined sprint goal

Name: task_must_be_in_sprint
Description: A task being worked on must belong to the current sprint backlog

Name: feature_requires_documentation
Description: A completed feature should have corresponding documentation

Name: project_has_start_date
Description: Every project must have a defined start date

Name: skill_level_requirement
Description: A worker on a specialized task must have a certain skill level

Name: blocker_must_be_addressed
Description: A blocker with high severity cannot have a status of 'ignored'

Name: product_backlog_is_managed
Description: A Product Backlog must have a last updated date
